info.description:
API definition for eRS

 | API Documentation |
 |-----|
  |[e-Referral Service - FHIR API](https://digital.nhs.uk/developer/api-catalogue/e-referral-service-fhir)|


 | FHIR Implementation Guide | Version |
 |-----|-----|
 |[ukcore.release1.test](https://simplifier.net/guide/hl7fhirukcorer4release1/home)||
 |[uk.nhsdigital.r4.test](https://simplifier.net/guide/NHSDigital/Home)||

tags.name: Appointment
tags.description:
Profile : [England-Appointment](https://simplifier.net/guide/NHSDigital/Home/FHIRAssets/AllAssets/Profiles/England-Appointment.guide.md) (additional rules to the resource) 
 Resource type: [Appointment](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/Appointment.html) (also contains links to code generations schemas)

get.summary: server-capabilities: Fetch the server FHIR CapabilityStatement

post.summary: create-type: Create a new Appointment instance

put.summary: update-instance: Update an existing ServiceRequest instance, or create using a client-assigned ID

parameters.name: patient:identifier
parameters.description:
The patient identifier (e.g. NHS Number) that the service request is about Search on an identifier of the Patient, usualy NHS Number

 | Type |  Expression | 
 |--------|--------| 
 | [token ](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/search.html#token)|  ServiceRequest.subject.identifier.where(resolve() is Patient).identifier | ServiceRequest.subject.identifier.where(resolve() is Patient).where(resolve() is Resource).identifier |

post.summary: create-type: Create a new ServiceRequest instance

put.summary: update-instance: Update an existing Task instance, or create using a client-assigned ID

parameters.name: owner
parameters.description:
Search by task owner Search by task owner

 | Type |  Expression | 
 |--------|--------| 
 | [reference ](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/search.html#reference)|  Task.owner |

parameters.name: code
parameters.description:
Search by task code (worklist type) Search by task code

 | Type |  Expression | 
 |--------|--------| 
 | [token ](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/search.html#token)|  Task.code |

post.summary: create-type: Create a new Task instance

parameters.name: appointment-type
parameters.description:
The style of appointment or patient that may be booked in the slot (not service type) The style of appointment or patient that may be booked in the slot (not service type)

 | Type |  Expression | 
 |--------|--------| 
 | [token ](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/search.html#token)|  Slot.appointmentType |

parameters.name: schedule.actor:HealthcareService
parameters.description:
A single service ID is required to indicate the service for which appointment slots are required. The Schedule Resource that we are seeking a slot within

 Chained search parameter. Please see [chained](http://www.hl7.org/fhir/search.html#chaining)

 | Name |  Expression | 
 |--------|--------| 
 | schedule |  Slot.schedule | 


 Caution: This does not appear to be a valid search parameter. **Please check Hl7 FHIR conformance.**

parameters.name: status
parameters.description:
The free/busy status of the appointment The free/busy status of the appointment

 | Type |  Expression | 
 |--------|--------| 
 | [token ](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/search.html#token)|  Slot.status |

post.summary: create-type: Create a new QuestionnaireResponse instance
post.description: Use this api to create a shortlist

get.description: Use this api to retrieve a shortlist

parameters.name: service-type
parameters.description:
The type of service provided by this healthcare service The type of service provided by this healthcare service

 | Type |  Expression | 
 |--------|--------| 
 | [token ](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/search.html#token)|  HealthcareService.type |

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description:
Can't find this parameter presume need to: External identifiers for this item External identifiers for this item

 | Type |  Expression | 
 |--------|--------| 
 | [token ](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/search.html#token)|  HealthcareService.identifier |

get.description: Unable to find existing matching service
